analyzed: mahāprasthānikam parva
nārāyaṇam namaskṛtya naram ca eva narottamam

original: devīṃ sarasvatīṃ vyāsaṃ tato jayamudīrayet // Bhmj_17.1 //
analyzed: devīm sarasvatīm vyāsam tatas jayam udīrayet
atha vṛṣṇi kṣayam śrutvā dharmasūnuḥ dhanaṃjayāt
namaḥ kālāya baline niḥśvasan iti abhāṣata
sarva tyāga kṛtaḥ yogaḥ viveśa bhrātṛbhiḥ saha

original: rājyaṃ dauryodhanaṃ dattvā guṇāhārya yuyutsave // Bhmj_17.3 //
analyzed: rājyam dauryodhanam dattvā guṇa āhārya yuyutsave
nije parikṣitam rājye sthāpayitvā abhimanyu jam
tad pālane samādiśya subhadram satya śāsanaḥ
prakṛtibhyaḥ vinikṣipya tam dvijebhyaḥ ca dharma vid

original: śrāddhaṃ vidhāya bandhubhyaḥ puṇyāmiṣṭiṃ ca naiṣṭhikīm // Bhmj_17.5 //
analyzed: śrāddham vidhāya bandhubhyaḥ puṇyām iṣṭim ca naiṣṭhikīm
agnīn utsṛjya salile paurān āśvāsya duḥkhitān
devīm āmantrya vasudhām sa anujaḥ draupadī sakhaḥ
pratasthe sarva saṃnyāsī yoga yuktaḥ yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
tatas sametya bhagavān svayam eva hutāśanaḥ

original: pārthājjagrāha gāṇḍīvaṃ tau cākṣayyau maheṣudhī // Bhmj_17.7 //
analyzed: pārthāt jagrāha gāṇḍīvam tau ca akṣayyau mahā iṣudhī
śvā tān anuyayau ekaḥ vāryamāṇaḥ yatnataḥ

original: atha te śanakaiḥ prāpurdiśaṃ dakṣiṇapaścimām // Bhmj_17.8 //
analyzed: atha te śanakais prāpuḥ diśam dakṣiṇa paścimām

original: dṛṣṭvā tatra samudreṇa bhṛtāṃ dvāravatīṃ jalaiḥ /
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā tatra samudreṇa bhṛtām dvāravatīm jalaiḥ
āśām udīcīm prayayuḥ bhuvaḥ kṛtvā pradakṣiṇam
himācalam atikramya prāptāḥ te vālukā arṇavam
dadṛśuḥ merum uttuṅga śṛṅga āliṅgita nandanam
niragāre nirālambe tasmin adhvani dustare
śirīṣa pelava tanuḥ papāta drupada ātmajā

original: tāṃ yātajīvitāṃ dṛṣṭvā bhīmaḥ prāha yudhiṣṭhiram /
analyzed: tām yāta jīvitām dṛṣṭvā bhīmaḥ prāha yudhiṣṭhiram
rājan pāñcāla rājasya sutā iyam patitā bhuvi
cintayan api paśyāmi na asyāḥ kim api kilbiṣam
kasmāt eṣā tapaḥ yegam tyaktvā pañcatvam āgatā
dharmasūnuḥ niśamya etat anāvṛtta mukhaḥ vadat
babhuva syāḥ sarvadā abhyadhikā ūrjune
iti ukte bhūmipālena sahadevo patat bhuvi

original: tasminnipatite pṛṣṭo bhīmenoce nṛpaḥ punaḥ // Bhmj_17.15 //
analyzed: tasmin nipatite pṛṣṭaḥ bhīmena ūce nṛpaḥ punar
eṣa prajñā abhimānena jaḍam jagat amanyata

original: iti dharmasutenokte papāta nakulaḥ kṣitau // Bhmj_17.16 //
analyzed: iti dharmasutena ukte papāta nakulaḥ kṣitau
rājā pṛṣṭaḥ tha bhīmena vrajan evā bravīt punar

original: rūpamānī smareṇāpi spardhāmeṣa na ca kṣamī // Bhmj_17.17 //
analyzed: rūpa mānī smareṇa api spardhām eṣa na ca kṣamī
iti ukte vrajatā rājñā nipapāta dhanaṃjayaḥ

original: punaśca pṛṣṭo bhīmena jagāda jagatīpatiḥ // Bhmj_17.18 //
analyzed: punar ca pṛṣṭaḥ bhīmena jagāda jagatīpatiḥ
śūra mānī cacāra eṣa śithilam samara aṅgane
iti bruvāṇaḥ bhūpālaḥ jagāma eva a vilupta dhīḥ
bhīmaḥ tatas nipatitaḥ patitaḥ smi iti uvāca tam
saḥ bravīt bala darpaḥ bhūt bhīma bahu aśanasya te
tatas bhūt ekaḥ eva atha vrajan anugataḥ śunā
dadarśa sākṣāt āyātam rathena indram yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
rājan mad puram ehi iti śakreṇa uktaḥ jagāda saḥ

original: śunā virahitaḥ svargaṃ saśarīro na kāmaye // Bhmj_17.22 //
analyzed: śunā virahitaḥ svargam sa śarīraḥ na kāmaye
tam abravīt surapatiḥ śunām svarge kutas gatiḥ
dhiṣṇyam ārohatu śvā iti tvad anyaḥ kaḥ nu bhāṣate
tatas tam ūce nṛpatiḥ bhakta tyāgam katham sahe

original: bhaktavidveṣiṇaḥ svarge nṛśaṃsasya kuto gatiḥ // Bhmj_17.24 //
analyzed: bhakta vidveṣiṇaḥ svarge nṛśaṃsasya kutas gatiḥ
yadi asti su kutam kiṃcid mama tena sureśvara

original: yātu svargaṃ sadehaḥ svā nainaṃ tyaktuṃ samutsahe // Bhmj_17.25 //
analyzed: yātu svargam sa dehaḥ svāḥ na enam tyaktum samutsahe
strī vadhena eva sadṛśam brahma sva haraṇena ca
sarva pāpa ātmakam santaḥ bhakta tyāgam pracakṣate
iti ukte dharmarājena dharmaḥ tyaktvā śva vigraham

original: tamūce putra tuṣṭo 'smi sadvṛttena tavāmunā // Bhmj_17.27 //
analyzed: tam ūce putra tuṣṭaḥ smi sat vṛttena tava amunā

original: dṛṣṭo 'si pāthaso hetoḥ purā dvaitavane mayā /
analyzed: dṛṣṭaḥ si pāthasaḥ hetoḥ purā dvaitavane mayā

original: svasti te vraja bhūpāla saśarīraḥ surālayam // Bhmj_17.28 //
analyzed: svasti te vraja bhūpāla sa śarīraḥ surālayam
iti pitrā samādiṣṭaḥ vimānam vipula prabham
āruhya puṇya sopānam viveśa sura mandiram
pūjyamānaḥ suraiḥ sārdham munibhiḥ nārada ādibhiḥ
rāja ṛṣi tārakā madhye sa rarāja aṃśumān iva

original: tataḥ sa śakramavadbhrātaro yatra me sthitāḥ /
analyzed: tatas sa śakram avat bhrātaraḥ yatra me sthitāḥ

original: śyāmā ca yatra dayitā tatra vāso mamepsitaḥ // Bhmj_17.31 //
analyzed: śyāmā ca yatra dayitā tatra vāsaḥ mama īpsitaḥ
tam abravīt sahasrākṣaḥ bhāvam mā mānuṣam gamaḥ
rājarṣibhiḥ an āsādyām prāptaḥ si gatim uttamām
iti uktaḥ pi asakṛt yatnāt vajriṇā dharmanandanaḥ
bhrātṝn avāptum icchāmi iti abhāṣata punar punar
iti śrī kṣemendra viracitāyām bhāratamañjaryām mahāprasthānikam parva
